article: Health needs good sleep. Do you know  _  to sleep well? You should go to bed at the same time every night and get up at the same time every  _  . This good habit can make you sleep better. Don't sleep for  _  hours on Saturday and Sunday mornings. And if you follow a good schedule for a longer time, you will have  _  energy and feel good. Don't watch television  _  you go to bed. You need to be  _  before you go to bed. You can read a book or listen to music. It helps your body get ready for sleep, just like warming up can get your body ready for  _  . Everybody knows that exercise can make you sleep better. But if you do exercise right before you go to bed, it will stimulate your  _  and that makes it difficult to fall asleep quickly. If  _  time is the only time you can exercise, you should try to do it as  _  as possible.
